title: [Bug] [1.11.1] [Achieve] Huge Memory Leak Causes OutOfMemoryException
body:
Huge Memory Leak Causes OutOfMemoryException When Running Nethermind in Mainnet Achieve Mode.

This leak consumes over 200 GB of RAM in less than 24 hours.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1648586/132684216-a0194692-ba2c-4244-823d-6fd23df9aba1.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1648586/132684398-4499cbe8-ed84-452d-8642-3efe74b5730f.png)

**Version Information:**
 - OS: Windows Server 2019 & 2022
 - Browser: Any
 - Version: <= 1.11.1
I have the Issue on Ubuntu . but it doesnt throw `OutOfMemoryException` . the node does consume more than the limit i set in the config.

On Linux i had to do the following to fix the issue ( this is a hacky work around but the server doesnt suddenly restart anymore) :
```
sysctl -w vm.drop_caches=3
sync
echo 3 | tee /proc/sys/vm/drop_caches
```
